page.title: 18More thoughts from grown-ups
page.content: The famine in Africa. Almost everyone we spoke to said how much the B.B.C.film report from Ethiopia had upset them. The news from Africa has not improved very much and most people appeared shocked that this sort of tragedy can occur in 1985. Some of our mums had done something themselves to try to help.There had been some coffee mornings, wine and cheese parties and many varied sponsored events.Many other people had just sent money to the various charities which have been helping the peoples of East Africa. The pop stars have done a lot to help with this problem. We think everybody should help because we are all heaps better off than any of the people we saw on our television.
